metadata.name: The Nexus City - Concept 1
metadata.description:
The Nexus is an open source, community-driven, remixable metaverse city experiment:

- Bring The Nexus to the places your people already are
- Fork it and modify it to fit your community
- Build with us and be part of something as we establish outpost nodes across the metaverse

The City in the Clouds

There's a growing movement of digital communities that are building incredible virtual architecture and places in the cloud. We like to envision a positive futuristic outcome for humanity as a high tech society living in balance with nature and AI agents.

~* We paint with software, determination, and love *~

We're building this floating island with open source tools, permissive licensing (CC0), and interoperable file formats so that we can be portable enough to inspire others wherever they may be.

More info: https://github.com/TheNexusCity/TheNexus
Dimensions: 4800x2700
Size: 1.9 MB
License: CC0
